column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A luxury Audi A7 sedan ploughed through a fence of a national television station at 1:30 am on Wednesday
column7: Russey Keo district and hit the antenna .------According to reports
column8: the A7 left the road while driving west
column9: and went through the fence of the National Television of Kampuchea. The car owner then tried to conceal the number plate (Phnom Penh 2BA-8792)Â  and the  gaping hole in the fence to prevent journalists from taking pictures.------After the incident
column10: local authorities arrived at the scene
column11: and co-ordinated a solution between the driver and the owner of the fence. ------POST NEWS
